title: Vengeance is Mine,
description: In VENGEANCE IS MINE, the CHILDREN OF ADAM prequel story, Eckhard discovers love and hate that will last centuries. With his new bride Aviva and lifelong friend Penrod, Eckhard sets aside a life of privilege to start a new life. Their first winter is hard, but nothing can dampen the spirits of the trio. Then a desperate father, whose one daughter is murdered and the other taken visits Eckhard. When he volunteers to aid in the search, a new world of bloodthirsty monsters are exposed. Along with the revelation of the Night Stalkers, comes the shock of how Adam lived for 930 years.
author: Lon Widdicombe
